function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in cargo shipping leading to increased airfreight costs","Impact":"Economic shocks, mass increase in global poverty levels","Mitigation":"Investment in alternative transportation methods, subsidies for affected industries","Technologies":"Internet of Things (IoT) for supply chain management, cloud computing for logistics","People":"Workers in affected industries, global population","Owner":"Governments, transportation companies"},{"Description":"Remote working and telemedicine becoming more prevalent","Impact":"Reduced commuting, potential strain on internet infrastructure","Mitigation":"Investment in internet infrastructure, flexible working arrangements","Technologies":"Telecommunication technologies, remote collaboration tools","People":"Remote workers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Telecommunication companies, employers"},{"Description":"Reduction in primary energy consumption due to economic slowdown","Impact":"Positive impact on the environment, potential impact on energy companies","Mitigation":"Investment in renewable energy, diversification of energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy management systems","People":"Energy companies, environmental activists","Owner":"Governments, energy companies"}]}
